E1205 - Too many arguments for logging f.diff:
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1 +1,17 @@
-        logging.info("Image loaded with dimensions %dx%d", self.width, self.height, filename)  # Too many arguments for logging format string (E1205)
+```python
+"""Image processing module."""
+
+import logging
+
+def load_image(filename):
+    """Loads an image from file and returns its dimensions.
+
+    Args:
+        filename: The path to the image file.
+
+    Returns:
+        A tuple containing the width and height of the image.
+    """
+
+    logging.info("Image loaded with dimensions %dx%d", (self.width, self.height), filename)
+    return self.width, self.height
